List of all members.

Detailed Description

The enet client base class.

To send packets only when the client is connected, try something like : 

 EnetClient ec;
 while(!ec.isConnected()){
   ec.connect(...);
 }

Be careful because the while statement may be endless.

Member Data Documentation

bool RainbruRPG::Network::EnetClient::connected [protected]

Is this peer successfully connected.

Set by default to false, this value is set to true if the peer is succeffully created.

See also:
isConnected()
